ThanksÂ¶

  • Bitbucket.org

    • Code repository is here: http://bitbucket.org/shibu/berrymq/

  • Sphinx is a great documentation tool.

  • People

    • Voluntas gives me much inspiration about distributed architecture via skype chat.
    • Tokibito helped me uplaoding to PyPI.
    • m_seki gave me idea of equality server/client model as dRuby(he is dRuby auther). He and I are community member of Tochigi Ruby.

  • Tochigi prefecture

    Tochigi prefecture is first in strawberry production in Japan. The name of berryMQ comes from Tochigi prefecture where I live.

  • Some images comes from flickr.

    • Miniature Strawberry taken by NorinP under CC BY-NC for H1 background
    • dew on the strawberry leaves taken by Zoe under CC BY-NC-SA for H2 bacground
    • Berries! taken by Kaiesh under CC BY-NC-SA for sidebar background
